file.name: openapi.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.1
info:
  title: expense
  description: >-
    This is a generated connector for [WorkDay Expense REST API v1](https://community.workday.com/sites/default/files/file-hosting/restapi/index.html) OpenAPI specification.

    This API enables applications to access operations to extend the functionality of Workday Expenses.
  version: v1
  x-ballerina-init-description: >
    The connector initialization requires setting the API credentials. 
    Follow [this guide](https://credentials.workday.com/docs/authentication/) and
    obtain tokens.
  x-ballerina-display:
    label: Workday Expense
    iconPath: icon.png
tags:
- name: entries
  description: The Quick Expense that you can create, modify or submit. This can be
    an expense with a minimal set of fields.
- name: expenseItems
  description: The expense items that can be used on expense report lines.
- name: reports
  description: The expense reports that you can create, modify, or submit.
paths:
  /expenseItems/{id}:
    get:
      tags:
      - expenseItems
      summary: Retrieves a single instance of an expense item.
      operationId: getExpenseItemInstance
      description: |-
        Retrieves details of an Expense Item referenced by its Workday Identifier (WID).

        Secured by: View: Expense Item, Access Expense Item (Segmented)

        Scope: Expenses
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        description: The Workday ID of the resource.
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ExpenseItemsServiceRepresentation'
        400:
          description: Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        401:
          description: Invalid resource or operation. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        403:
          description: User has insufficient permissions. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        404:
          description: Resource not found. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
  /reports/{id}:
    get:
      tags:
      - reports
      summary: Retrieves a single instance of an Expense Report.
      operationId: getExpenseReportInstance
      description: |-
        Retrieves details of an Expense Report referenced by its Workday Identifier (WID).

        Secured by: Self-Service: Expense Report

        Scope: Expenses
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        description: The Workday ID of the resource.
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ReportServiceRepresentation'
        400:
          description: Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        401:
          description: Invalid resource or operation. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        403:
          description: User has insufficient permissions. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        404:
          description: Resource not found. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
  /entries/{id}:
    get:
      tags:
      - entries
      summary: Retrieves a single instance of a Quick Expense.
      operationId: getQuickExpenseInstance
      description: |-
        Retrieves a Quick Expense with the specified WID.

        Secured by: Self-Service: Expense Report

        Scope: Expenses

        Contains attachment(s)
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        description: The Workday ID of the resource.
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ExpenseEntryServiceRepresentation'
        400:
          description: Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        401:
          description: Invalid resource or operation. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        403:
          description: User has insufficient permissions. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        404:
          description: Resource not found. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
    put:
      tags:
      - entries
      summary: Updates an existing Quick Expense instance.
      operationId: updateQuickExpenseInstance
      description: |-
        Updates an existing Quick Expense instance with the specified WID. Replaces the existing instance with the specified data in the request body.

        Secured by: Self-Service: Expense Report

        Scope: Expenses

        Contains attachment(s)
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        description: The Workday ID of the resource.
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/EntryServicePUTRepresentation'
        required: true
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data. Updating file.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/EntryServicePUTRepresentation'
        400:
          description: |-
            Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)

            This quick expense cannot be modified because the expense status is not new.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        401:
          description: Invalid resource or operation. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        403:
          description: User has insufficient permissions. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        404:
          description: Resource not found. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
      x-codegen-request-body-name: entryServicePUTRepresentation
    delete:
      tags:
      - entries
      description: |-
        Deletes a Quick Expense with the specified WID.

        Secured by: Self-Service: Expense Report

        Scope: Expenses
      operationId: deleteQuickExpenseByID
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        description: The Workday ID of the resource.
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data. Deleting resource.
          content: {}
        400:
          description: |-
            Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)

            Only quick expenses can be deleted.

            This quick expense is on an expense report line and can not be deleted.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        401:
          description: Invalid resource or operation. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        403:
          description: User has insufficient permissions. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        404:
          description: Resource not found. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
    patch:
      tags:
      - entries
      description: |-
        Partially updates an existing Quick Expense with the specified WID for the fields provided in the request body.

        Secured by: Self-Service: Expense Report

        Scope: Expenses

        Contains attachment(s)
      operationId: updateQuickExpenseByID
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        description: The Workday ID of the resource.
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/EntryServicePUTRepresentation'
        required: true
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data. Updating file.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/EntryServicePUTRepresentation'
        400:
          description: |-
            Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)

            This quick expense cannot be modified because the expense status is not new.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        401:
          description: Invalid resource or operation. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        403:
          description: User has insufficient permissions. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        404:
          description: Resource not found. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
      x-codegen-request-body-name: entryServicePUTRepresentation
  /reports:
    get:
      tags:
      - reports
      summary: Retrieves a collection of expense reports.
      operationId: getCollectionOfExpenseReports
      description: |-
        Retrieves a collection of expense reports. You can filter the reports by memo, status, and date.

        Secured by: Self-Service: Expense Report

        Scope: Expenses
      parameters:
      - name: expenseReportMemo
        in: query
        description: Memo label to be used for REST API
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: expenseReportStatus
        in: query
        description: Status label to be used for REST API
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: fromDate
        in: query
        description: Creation Date label to be used for REST API
        schema:
          type: string
          format: date
      - name: limit
        in: query
        description: The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default
          is 20. The maximum is 100.
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int64
      - name: offset
        in: query
        description: 'The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection.
          The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control paging
          of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset is 9, the response
          returns a collection of 5 objects starting with the 10th object.'
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int64
      - name: toDate
        in: query
        description: Creation Date label to be used for REST API
        schema:
          type: string
          format: date
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  data:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      $ref: '#/components/schemas/ReportServiceRepresentation'
                  total:
                    type: integer
                    format: int64
                description: collection something or other
        400:
          description: Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        401:
          description: Invalid resource or operation. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        403:
          description: User has insufficient permissions. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        404:
          description: Resource not found. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
    post:
      tags:
      - reports
      description: |-
        Creates an expense report.

        Secured by: Self-Service: Expense Report

        Scope: Expenses
      operationId: createExpenseReport
      parameters:
      - name: expenseReportMemo
        in: query
        description: Memo label to be used for REST API
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: expenseReportStatus
        in: query
        description: Status label to be used for REST API
        style: form
        explode: true
        schema:
          type: array
          items:
            type: string
      - name: fromDate
        in: query
        description: Creation Date label to be used for REST API
        schema:
          type: string
          format: date
      - name: toDate
        in: query
        description: Creation Date label to be used for REST API
        schema:
          type: string
          format: date
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ReportPostServiceRepresentation'
        required: true
      responses:
        201:
          description: Resource created.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ReportPostServiceRepresentation'
        400:
          description: Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        401:
          description: Invalid resource or operation. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        403:
          description: User has insufficient permissions. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        404:
          description: Resource not found. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
      x-codegen-request-body-name: reportPostServiceRepresentation
  /reports/{id}/lines:
    post:
      tags:
      - reports
      summary: Creates a collection of expense report lines.
      operationId: createCollectionExpenseReportLines.
      description: |-
        Creates an expense report line for an expense report with the specified ID. You can also create lines from Credit Card Transactions, Quick Expenses, or Travel Booking Records.

        Secured by: Self-Service: Expense Report

        Scope: Expenses
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        description: The Workday ID of the resource.
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/PostExpenseReportLineRepresentation'
        required: true
      responses:
        201:
          description: Resource created.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/PostExpenseReportLineRepresentation'
        400:
          description: |-
            Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)

            Can only add Expenses to Expense Reports that are in Draft Status

            Status of Quick Expense to be added must be New

            Status of Travel Booking Record to be added must be New

            Status of Credit Card Transaction to be added must be New
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        401:
          description: Invalid resource or operation. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        403:
          description: User has insufficient permissions. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        404:
          description: Resource not found. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
      x-codegen-request-body-name: postExpenseReportLineRepresentation
  /reports/{id}/submit:
    post:
      tags:
      - reports
      description: |-
        Submit the Expense Report for approval.

        Secured by: Submit Expense Report (REST API)

        Scope: Expenses
      operationId: submitExpenseReportApproval
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        description: The Workday ID of the resource.
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/SubmitExpenseReportRepresentation'
        required: true
      responses:
        201:
          description: Resource created.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/SubmitExpenseReportRepresentation'
        400:
          description: |-
            Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)

            Can only submit Expense Reports that are in Draft Status.

            [Custom exception message for expense report exception]
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        401:
          description: Invalid resource or operation. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        403:
          description: User has insufficient permissions. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        404:
          description: Resource not found. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
      x-codegen-request-body-name: submitExpenseReportRepresentation
  /entries:
    get:
      tags:
      - entries
      summary: Retrieves a collection of Quick Expenses.
      operationId: getCollectionOfQuickExpenses
      description: |-
        Retrieves a collection of Quick Expenses for a user by the date in an ascending order. You can filter the entries by entry type, status, and date.

        Secured by: Self-Service: Expense Report

        Scope: Expenses

        Contains attachment(s)
      parameters:
      - name: entryType
        in: query
        description: Identifies the class type of the expense instance.
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: expenseEntryStatus
        in: query
        description: Expense Status
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: fromDate
        in: query
        description: Date of Expense Entry
        schema:
          type: string
          format: date
      - name: limit
        in: query
        description: The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default
          is 20. The maximum is 100.
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int64
      - name: offset
        in: query
        description: 'The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection.
          The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control paging
          of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset is 9, the response
          returns a collection of 5 objects starting with the 10th object.'
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int64
      - name: toDate
        in: query
        description: Date of Expense Entry
        schema:
          type: string
          format: date
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  data:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      $ref: '#/components/schemas/ExpenseEntryServiceRepresentation'
                  total:
                    type: integer
                    format: int64
                description: collection something or other
        400:
          description: Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        401:
          description: Invalid resource or operation. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        403:
          description: User has insufficient permissions. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        404:
          description: Resource not found. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
    post:
      tags:
      - entries
      description: |-
        Creates a Quick Expense instance. In the request body, you must specify the required TransactionDate field.

        Secured by: Self-Service: Expense Report

        Scope: Expenses

        Contains attachment(s)
      operationId: createQuickExpenseInstance
      parameters:
      - name: entryType
        in: query
        description: Identifies the class type of the expense instance.
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: expenseEntryStatus
        in: query
        description: Expense Status
        schema:
          type: string
      - name: fromDate
        in: query
        description: Date of Expense Entry
        schema:
          type: string
          format: date
      - name: toDate
        in: query
        description: Date of Expense Entry
        schema:
          type: string
          format: date
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/EntryServiceRepresentation'
        required: true
      responses:
        201:
          description: Resource created.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/EntryServiceRepresentation'
        400:
          description: |-
            Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)

            There must be exactly 1 attachment for receipt scanning.

            Receipt scanning is unavailable in your locale. You can still attach your receipt to the quick expense without submitting it for scanning.

            Expense transaction date is required.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        401:
          description: Invalid resource or operation. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:

  /entries/{id}/attachments:
    post:
      tags:
      - entries
      summary: Creates new attachments for the existing expense entry.
      operationId: createsNewAttachmentsForExpenseEntry
      description: |-
        Creates attachments for the existing expense entry with the specified ID. Maximum file size is 32 MB.

        Secured by: Self-Service: Expense Report

        Scope: Expenses

        Contains attachment(s)
      parameters:
      - name: id
        in: path
        description: The Workday ID of the resource.
        required: true
        schema:
          type: string
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ExpenseEntryImage'
        required: true
      responses:
        201:
          description: Resource created.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ExpenseEntryImage'
        400:
          description: Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        401:
          description: Invalid resource or operation. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        403:
          description: User has insufficient permissions. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        404:
          description: Resource not found. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
      x-codegen-request-body-name: expenseEntryImage
  /expenseItems:
    get:
      tags:
      - expenseItems
      summary: Retrieves a collection of expense items.
      operationId: getCollectionOfItems
      description: |-
        Retrieves a collection of expense items. When you don't specify the search string, Workday retrieves all expense items.

        Secured by: View: Expense Item, Access Expense Item (Segmented)

        Scope: Expenses
      parameters:
      - name: disallowFixedItems
        in: query
        description: Is this expense item validated for a fixed amount?
        schema:
          type: boolean
      - name: limit
        in: query
        description: The maximum number of objects in a single response. The default
          is 20. The maximum is 100.
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int64
      - name: offset
        in: query
        description: 'The zero-based index of the first object in a response collection.
          The default is 0. Use offset with the limit parameter to control paging
          of a response collection. Example: If limit is 5 and offset is 9, the response
          returns a collection of 5 objects starting with the 10th object.'
        schema:
          type: integer
          format: int64
      - name: searchString
        in: query
        description: Request string used to retrieve the Expense Items
        schema:
          type: string
      responses:
        200:
          description: Successful response. A successful response can return no matched
            data.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                type: object
                properties:
                  data:
                    type: array
                    items:
                      $ref: '#/components/schemas/ExpenseItemsServiceRepresentation'
                  total:
                    type: integer
                    format: int64
                description: collection something or other
        400:
          description: Invalid request. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        401:
          description: Invalid resource or operation. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        403:
          description: User has insufficient permissions. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        404:
          description: Resource not found. (https://community.workday.com/rest/error-messages)
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/VALIDATION_ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
        default:
          description: An error occurred.
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ERROR_MODEL_REFERENCE'
